title: The Molecular theory of matter
creator_credit: ERPI Classroom Films and Encyclopaedia Britannica Films
brief_description: Discusses simple molecular theory, diffusion of gases, evaporation of liquids, melting of solids, force exerted by molecules and Brownian movement. Suitable for upper secondary level.
